document_data.mainbody:
Hslaat was a troglodyte warrior in the Wormwrithings area in the late 15 century DR. He was the war chief and champion of Laogzed in the tribe led by Sslaar.
Circa 1486 DR, he led a group of his warriors to defeat a drow patrol. The drow leader had a magic sword that was claimed as a trophy by chieftain Sslaar. Hslaat disagreed, saying that it was his by right of killing its owner. Soon a civil war started between Sslaars and Hslaats loyalists. Hslaat ordered the capture of Hhoort, the mate of Sslaar.
